original_text: People who do wicked things cannot hide themselves. There is no place dark enough for them to hide from God. People who do wicked things cannot hide themselves. There is no place dark enough for them to hide from God. People who do wicked things cannot hide themselves. There is no place dark enough for them to hide from God. People who do wicked things cannot hide themselves. There is no place dark enough for them to hide from God. People who do wicked things cannot hide themselves.
korean_text: 행악자는 숨을 만한 흑암이나 사망의 그늘이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: People who do wicked things cannot hide themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 일을 하는 사람들은 자신을 숨길 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: There is no place dark enough for them to hide from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님으로부터 숨을 만큼 충분히 어두운 곳은 없습니다.
